page name incompatibilities.comment: not supported in DokuWiki page names: if used in internal link, it will be replaced by '&' and the displayed link will be cut off at the '&'.

content incompatibilities.comment: Table of Contents in MoinMoin, generated by default in DokuWiki
Four asterisks in MoinMoin; bold on and off in DokuWiki (will be removed by tagcleaner)
Horizontal line in MoinMoin; not supported in DokuWiki
Possibly the flag to prevent turning CamelCase into page links
List all subpages - not possible in DokuWIki (at least without special plugin)
Not supported in DokuWiki (except horizontal alignments)
